hero.intro: Mobile Full-stack Developer and AI enthusiast.

eaware.title: Full-stack Developer
eaware.desc_1: Development of cross-platform mobile applications (iOS/Android) using React Native.
eaware.desc_2: Creation of responsive interfaces and integration with RESTful APIs.
eaware.desc_3: Integration of WiFi functionalities and direct connection with IoT devices.

puc.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
puc.desc_1: Academic focus on Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Data Structures.

ocean.desc: Full-stack Ecosystem (Mobile & Web) for bar management published on the App Store. Mobile App with Expo Router, Reanimated, and Context API. Serverless Backend with Firebase Cloud Functions.

mcp.desc: 'Local-First' voice-controlled smart assistant. ReAct architecture with LangChain and Ollama to interpret commands and manipulate spreadsheets.

fer.desc: Modular framework for training Facial Emotion Recognition models. Support for multiple datasets and backbones (ResNet, DenseNet).

genetic.desc: Genetic Algorithm 'from scratch' for Feature Selection. Adaptive Mutation and Elitism to maximize accuracy (93.86% with 80% feature reduction).

skins.desc: Full-stack platform for trading digital assets (CS2 Skins). RESTful Backend in Node.js with JWT authentication and complex SQL modeling.

minimax.desc: Competitive autonomous agents (Tic-Tac-Toe 5x5). Comparative analysis between standard Minimax and Alpha-Beta Pruning with exponential node reduction.

networks.desc: Mapping of streaming collaborations (+80k entities). Manual implementation of graph algorithms (MST, Centrality) focused on performance.

contact.title: Got a proposal for me?
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and challenges. Feel free to contact me.
